sentence.Network_en: War turns morality inside out: killing and cruelty are virtues.
sentence.Network_cn: 战争颠倒是非：杀戮与残忍成了美德。

sentence.Network_en: We have sworn to fight cruelty wherever we find it.
I have been amazed at times that cruelty can go unpunished.
sentence.Network_cn: 我有时深感震惊，暴行竟可以不受惩罚。

list.abs: Human nature revolts against / at such cruelty ., 人出自本性厌恶这种暴行.
I can not conceive of such cruelty as take a child away from its mother ., 我真不能想象 , 竟有把孩子从他母亲手里夺走这种残酷行为.
cruelty是什么意思... ... extreme cruelty【 法】 极端虐待 mental cruelty【 法】 精神虐待 persistent cruelty【 法】 经常性虐待.

目前，特纳小姐面临虐待动物(animal cruelty)的指控，已被羁押于博德县(Boulder conuty )监狱，保释金被定为2500米元。那只吉娃娃 …
He seems to take delight in petty cruelty ., 他好像喜欢说伤人的话.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French crualte, based on Latin crudelitas, from crudelis (see cruel)

entry.def: Cruelty is behaviour that deliberately causes pain or distress to people or animals.

example.ex: Britain had laws against cruelty to animals but none to protect children...
example.tran: 英国有禁止虐待动物的法律，但却没有保护儿童的法律。

example.ex: He had been unable to escape the cruelties of war.
example.tran: 他没能逃脱战争的残酷。

means.word_mean: 1. a cruel act; a deliberate infliction of pain and suffering
3. the quality of being cruel and causing tension or annoyance

auth_sentence.content: Please, someone out there, stop this cruelty.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please, someone out there, stop this cruelty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please, someone out there, stop this cruelty.

auth_sentence.content: It sounds very much like animal cruelty to me.
auth_sentence.res_content: It sounds very much like animal cruelty to me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It sounds very much like animal cruelty to me.

auth_sentence.content: When they arrived, many found exploitation and cruelty.
auth_sentence.res_content: When they arrived, many found exploitation and cruelty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When they arrived, many found exploitation and cruelty.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,用在形容词后,表示"特性,性质等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: certain肯定的+ty特性,性质等→n.必然,肯定;必然的事
cruel残酷的+ty特性,性质等→n.残酷;残酷行为
entire全部的,完整的+ty特性,性质等→n.全部,完全

stems_affixes.value_cn: 虚弱,脆弱,意志薄弱,过失
stems_affixes.word_buile: frail脆弱的+ty特性,性质等→n.虚弱,脆弱,意志薄弱,过失

stems_affixes.value_cn: 新颖,新奇,新鲜,新奇的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: novel新奇的,新颖的+ty特性,性质等→n.新颖,新奇,新鲜,新奇的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 安全,保险;安全设备,保险装置
stems_affixes.word_buile: safe安全的+ty特性,性质等→n.安全,保险;安全设备,保险装置
special特别的+ty特性,性质等→n.专业,专长

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"粗野,残酷"; 2. =cross,表示"十字形,交叉"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 残酷的, 悲惨的, 使痛苦的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cru粗野,残酷+el→adj.残酷的, 悲惨的, 使痛苦的
cruel残酷的+ty表名词→n.残忍, 残酷
cru十字形,交叉+ise表名词→n.乘船巡游
cruise[v.巡航;以节省燃料的速度前进]+er表名词→n.巡洋舰;有船舱的游艇

Sentence.sentence: He captures birds only to let them go when he realizes the cruelty involved.

sentences.en: Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people.
sentences.cn: 对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍。
